extensionDescription.message: Get notified, whenever a followed streamer goes live. This extension features advanced control over the channels it monitors and a panel for quick access to those channels.

listTooltipOffline.message: No channel is live at the moment (Ctrl+Shift+L)
listTooltipOffline.description: Button tooltip when there are no live channels in the panel

listTooltipLive.description: Button tooltip for the panel when there are channels live

onlineNotification.description: Notification title when a channel goes live

updateNotification.description: Notification title when a channel changes the stream title

offlineNotification.description: Notification title when a channel goes offline

nonliveNotification.description: Notification when a channel changes a non-live state

copyNotification.message: Copied the stream URL of $CHANNEL$ to the clipboard
copyNotification.description: Notification content after the URL of a stream was copied from the panel context menu

channelManagerGenericError.description: An unknown error was encountered while trying to fetch a channel or user.

channelManagerLoadError.message: Couldn't load "$CHANNEL$" for $TYPE$. Please make sure you are using the correct username.
channelManagerLoadError.description: A network error was encountered while trying to load information on $CHANNEL$ (which can also be a user) from $TYPE$.

providerlivestream.description: Provider name for the original livestream.com

providernewlivestream.description: Provider name for the new livestream.com

cm_add.description: Label on button that opens a dialog to add a channel or user.

cm_autoAdd.description: Button to automatically add all users the user has credentials stored for

cm_autoAdd.title.message: Add favorites of users for which the browser has credentials stored.
cm_autoAdd.title.description: Tooltip for the auto add button (cm_autoAdd).

cm_dialog_cancel.description: Cancel the dialog for adding a user or channel.

cm_dialog_channel.description: Select label for adding a channel

cm_dialog_loading.description: Loading status indicator while adding a channel or user

cm_dialog_submit.description: Confirmation action in the dialog to add a channel or user

cm_dialog_title.description: Title of the dialog to add a new channel or user

cm_dialog_user.description: Select label for adding a user

cm_dialog_username.description: Label for the username field in the dialog to add a channel or user

cm_filter.placeholder.description: Placeholder in the filter field for the channel manager

cm_help.description: Label of the help button in the channel manager

cm_options.description: Label of the button to open the extension options in the channel manager

cm_remove.description: Label of the button to remove the selected users or channels

cm_remove.title.description: Tooltip of the button to remove the selected users or channels

cm_secondary_label.message: There already is a Channels Manager open. You can only use one at a time. If this is the only open tab with it, try reloading this page.
cm_secondary_label.description: Message shown when opening a second instance of the channel manager

cm_secondary_button.description: Button to go to the primary channel manager

cm_tab_channels.description: Label of the tab that contains all channels in the channel manager

cm_tab_users.description: Label of the tab that contains all users in the channel manager

cm_title.description: Title of the channel manager tab

cm_update.description: Label of the button to update the metadata of the selected users or channels

cm_update.title.message: Update the metadata of the selected item(s).
cm_update.title.description: Tooltip of the button to update the metadata of the selected users or channels

context_add.description: Context menu action to add a channel from the explore tab in the context menu

context_chat.description: Context menu action to open the chat of a channel in the panel

context_copy.description: Context menu action to copy the URL of a channel in the panel

context_open.description: Context menu action to open the archive page of a channel in the panel

context_pause.description: Context menu action on the refresh button in the panel to pause the queue

context_refresh.description: Refresh the status of a channel from the context menu in the panel

context_resume.description: Context menu action on the refresh button in the panel to resume the queue

panel_loading.description: Channels are being loaded into the panel

panel_manage.title.description: Tooltip on the button to open the channel manager from the panel

panel_no_results.description: The search in the explore tab of the panel held no results

panel_nothing.description: Message in the offline tab when there are no channels

panel_nothing_live.message: Nobody in your list is live.
panel_nothing_live.description: Message in the live tab when no channel is live

panel_refresh.title.message: Refresh the live statuses of all channels
panel_refresh.title.description: Tooltip on the refresh button in the panel

panel_search.title.description: Tooltip on the search button in the panel

panel_tab_explore.description: Label of the explore tab in the panel

panel_tab_live.description: Label of the tab with the live channels in the panel

panel_tab_nonlive.description: Label of the optional non-live tab in the panel

panel_tab_offline.description: Label of the tab with all offline channels in the panel

manageChannels_label.description: Label of the button to open the channel manager from the preferences

updateInterval_title.description: Title of the update interval setting in the preferences

updateInterval_description.message: Interval of the addon checking wether a stream is live in seconds. When 0, the states aren't automatically updated.
updateInterval_description.description: Description of the update interval setting in the preferences

onlineNotification_title.message: Show a notification when a stream goes online
onlineNotification_title.description: Title of the online notifications setting in the preferences

titleChangeNotification_title.message: Show a notification when a stream changes the title
titleChangeNotification_title.description: Title of the title change notifications setting in the preferences

offlineNotification_title.message: Show a notification when a stream goes offline
offlineNotification_title.description: Title of the offline notifications setting in the preferences

nonliveNotification_title.message: Show a notification when a stream enters a non-live state
nonliveNotification_title.description: Title of the non-live notifications setting in the preferences

nonliveNotification_description.message: This option is only relevant, when non-live streams aren't considered as live or offline.
nonliveNotification_description.description: Description of the non-live notifications setting in the preferences

panel_style_title.description: Title of the panel item style setting in the preferences

panel_style_options.Minimal.description: Label of the minimal option of the panel item style setting in the preferences

panel_style_options.Normal.description: Label of the normal option of the panel item style setting in the preferences

panel_style_options.Thumbnail.description: Label of the thumbnail option of the panel item style setting in the preferences

panel_nonlive_title.description: Title of the non-live treatment setting in the preferences

panel_nonlive_description.message: Non-live streams include things like hosted channels or rebroadcasts.
panel_nonlive_description.description: Description of the non-live treatment setting in the preferences

panel_nonlive_options.Livebottom.description: Live sorting to bottom option of the non-live treatment setting in the preferences

panel_nonlive_options.Distinct.description: Distinct state option of the non-live treatment setting in the preferences

panel_nonlive_options.Offline.description: Offline option of the non-live treatment setting in the preferences

panel_extras_title.description: Title of the panel extras setting in the preferences

panel_extras_description.message: Displays the viewer count, category and provider name of a channel in the pannel when available.
panel_extras_description.description: Description of the panel extras setting in the preferences

panel_badge_title.description: Title of the panel badge setting in the preferences

panel_badge_description.message: Displays the number of live channels on the button if any.
panel_badge_description.description: Description of the panel badge setting in the preferences

theme_title.description: Title of the theme setting in the preferences

theme_options.Light.description: Light option of the theme setting in the preferences

theme_options.Dark.description: Dark option of the theme setting in the preferences

copy_pattern_title.description: Title of the copy pattern setting in the preferences

copy_pattern_description.message: Customize the string that gets copied with the copy stream URL action in the panel context menu. {URL} gets replaced with the stream URL.
copy_pattern_description.description: Description of the copy pattern setting in the preferences

updateTab_title.message: Open a tab with update info after an update
updateTab_title.description: Title of the update tab setting in the preferences

updateTab_description.message: A tab with information about new features is opened when the extension is updated.
updateTab_description.description: Description of the update tab setting in the preferences

twitch_clientId_title.description: Title of the Twitch Client ID setting in the preferences

twitch_showHosting_title.message: Check if a Twitch Channel is hosting
twitch_showHosting_title.description: Title of the Twitch hosting setting in the preferences

youtube_apiKey_title.description: Title of the YouTube API key setting in the preferences

mlg_showRebroadcasts_title.description: Title of the MLG rebroadcasts setting in the preferences

channellist_cacheTime_title.message: Time to cache channel states while the browser is closed
channellist_cacheTime_title.description: Title of the cache time setting in the preferences

queueservice_maxRetries_title.message: Maximum number of attempts before a request is discarded
queueservice_maxRetries_title.description: Title of the request retry limit setting in the preferences

find_mature_title.description: Title of the mature setting in the preferences

resetOptions.description: Button to reset all preferences to their default value

errorState1.message: Recoverable error with Live Stream Notifier
errorState1.description: Error title when a recoverable error is blocking the extension

errorState2.message: Critical error with Live Stream Notifier
errorState2.description: Error title when an unrecoverable error is blocking the extension

lost_channels.message: Live Stream Notifier could not read the saved channels. To restore the extension, all channels and users have been removed.
lost_channels.description: Error while trying to read the DB, however the DB could be cleared

restore_failed.message: Sadly Live Stream Notifier's attempt at restoring its database failed. The only known fix is to reset the profile.
restore_failed.description: Error while trying to read the DB, no actions from within the extension will work.

restore_action.description: Button leading to instructions how to reset a Firefox profile.

pref_value_hidden.description: Shown as placeholder when a value is set but hidden in the preferences.

redirectUpdateNotification.message: $REDIRECTTARGET$ (redirected to by $CHANNEL$) has updated the title
redirectUpdateNotification.description: Notification title when a channel changes the stream title

context_back.description: Tooltip for closing the context panel in the popup

openChannel.description: Label for context panel action that corresponds to clicking on the channel

context_remove.description: Context panel action to remove a channel

rebroadcast_title_pattern_title.description: Title for the rebroadcast title pattern setting

rebroadcast_title_pattern_description.message: Comma separated list of strings that titles start with to make a stream count as rebroadcast. Each string is checked against a lower-case version of the title. Each pattern is also checked against the title wrapped in angle brackets.
rebroadcast_title_pattern_description.description: Description for the rebroadcast title pattern setting

context_redirector.description: Context panel item to open a redirector.

context_refresh_all.description: Context panel item to refresh all items

context_queue_title.description: Title of the queue context panel.

queue_concurrentRequests_title.description: Title of the concurrent request count setting.

cookies_disabled.message: Could not read your channel list, because cookies are disabled for the extension
cookies_disabled.description: Error message shown, when cookies are not enabled for the extension and it thus can't open the database.

enable_cookies.description: Button label to resolve the cookies problem. Links to a website with a guide.

export.description: Button label to export the preferences and channel list.

import.description: Button label to import preferences and channel list
